title: 怎么放置玩家输入/？查看插件列表？
author: 浮若沧桑

replies.author: Rioad
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder -essentials.help 删掉权限

http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... p;page=1#pid5561434
或者按照说明在配置文件里改

replies.author: 浮若沧桑
replies.txt_content:
Rioad 发表于 2017-7-21 07:30
/mangaddp builder -essentials.help 删掉权限
